login.Email sent: If there exists an account on this email address, an email has been sent to {email} with instructions on how to reset your password.
login.Password not strong: Password needs to be longer than 8 characters and needs a lower- and uppercase letter, number and a special character

apiError.400: There is something wrong with the request you are trying to make
apiError.401: You don't have the rights to access this data
apiError.404: This data does not seem to exist
apiError.500: Something is going wrong, please contact the Narrowcast team
